alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued May 25 at 2:26AM PDT until May 27 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO 8 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Waves of 2 to 4 feet on Pyramid Lake. * WHERE...Pyramid, Lahontan and Rye Patch. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to 8 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will diminish Thursday night to 5 to 10 mph before increasing again Friday afternoon.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
